Hero.title: World Leading Steel Company in KSA

AboutPage.storyDescription: Founded with a vision to support the Kingdom's industrial growth, 24 Seven Group has become a trusted partner for major projects across KSA, UAE, and beyond. We specialize in precision metal laser cutting, bending, and custom steel fabrication.
AboutPage.visionPara1: Saudi Vision 2030 is reshaping the Kingdom's economy, infrastructure, and industries. At 24 Seven Steel Production, we align our capabilities with this national transformation by providing high-quality steel solutions that support large-scale development.
AboutPage.visionPara2: We deliver precision-engineered steel products essential for creating the modern cities, industries, and infrastructure that Vision 2030 demands.

WhoWeAre.para1: To become one of the leading steel fabrication companies in KSA, providing <interior>Total Interior Solutions</interior> with consumer satisfaction.
WhoWeAre.para2: At <brand>24 Seven Group</brand>, we deliver high-quality steel solutions.

ReliableServices.laserDesc: At 24 Seven Group, we offer high-precision metal laser cutting services using advanced CNC laser technology.
ReliableServices.fabricationDesc: 24 Seven Group specializes in high-quality steel fabrication services for a wide range of sectors including construction, industrial, commercial, and residential projects.
ReliableServices.bendingDesc: A metal bending machine is an essential piece of equipment used in metalworking to bend and shape metal sheets, bars, or pipes into desired angles and forms.
ReliableServices.eventDesc: At 24 Seven Group, we provide end-to-end events production solutions that bring creativity, structure, and precision to every event.
ReliableServices.woodDesc: Our expert carpentry team provides high-quality wood joinery services, creating custom solutions for industrial and commercial interior needs.

MetalLaserCutting.sectionTitle: Precision Cuts, Perfect Results – Laser Cutting That Brings Your Designs to Life.
MetalLaserCutting.description: At 24 Seven Group, we offer high-precision metal laser cutting services using advanced CNC laser technology. Our solutions ensure clean edges, intricate detailing, and consistent accuracy across a wide range of metals.

SteelFabrication.sectionTitle: Precision Engineering – Robust Steel Solutions for Large-Scale Projects
SteelFabrication.description: At 24 Seven Group, we specialize in heavy-duty steel fabrication, providing structural integrity and high-quality finishes. From industrial frameworks to custom metal components, our engineering team ensures every project meets international safety and quality standards.

MetalBending.desc1: A metal bending machine is an essential piece of equipment used in metalworking to bend and shape metal sheets, bars, or pipes into desired angles and forms. These machines apply force through mechanical, hydraulic, or pneumatic systems to deform the metal without compromising its structural integrity.
MetalBending.desc2: Common types include press brakes, roll benders, and folding machines, each suited for specific bending tasks and materials. Metal bending machines are widely used in industries such as construction, automotive, aerospace, and fabrication to produce components like brackets, enclosures, frames, and beams with high precision and repeatability.

Woodery.sectionTitle: Crafted to Endure - Expert Wood Joinery & Carpentry for Elegant Spaces
Woodery.desc1: At 24 Seven Group, we provide high-end wood joinery solutions that bring warmth and elegance to every environment. From custom furniture and interior fit-outs to structural timber work, we blend traditional craftsmanship with modern design.
Woodery.desc2: Our in-house carpentry experts work with various premium woods to create bespoke solutions for residential, corporate, and event spaces. We ensure that every joint, finish, and detail is executed with absolute precision and durability.

EventProduction.sectionTitle: Creating Impactful Spaces – Custom Fabrication – for Unforgettable Events
EventProduction.desc1: At 24 Seven Group, we provide end-to-end events production solutions that bring creativity, structure, and precision to every event. From custom stage fabrication and exhibition stands to decorative elements and structural setups, we blend craftsmanship with functionality to deliver impact event environments.
EventProduction.desc2: Our in-house capabilities in steel fabrication, wood joinery, and custom builds allow us to tailor each production to the unique vision and requirements of our clients. Whether for corporate events, exhibitions, weddings, or public activation's, we ensure seamless execution, timely delivery, and a visually stunning outcome.

Vision.roleDesc: 24 Seven Steel Production plays a vital role in the Kingdom's transformation by delivering advanced steel fabrication, modern industrial solutions, and sustainable manufacturing that empower national mega-projects and economic growth.
Vision.commitmentPara1: Saudi Vision 2030 is reshaping the Kingdom's economy, infrastructure, and industries. At 24 Seven Steel Production, we align our capabilities with this national transformation by providing high-quality steel solutions that support large-scale development, modernization, and diversification.
Vision.commitmentPara2: We deliver precision-engineered steel products essential for creating the modern cities, industries, and infrastructure that Vision 2030 demands.

items.title: Enabling National Mega Projects
items.desc: We provide precision steel components essential for major infrastructure, industrial, and smart-city developments across the Kingdom.

items.title: Strengthening Local Manufacturing
items.desc: By producing high-quality steel locally, we help increase national industrial capacity and reduce reliance on imported materials.

items.title: Advanced Technology & Precision
items.desc: Our modern laser cutting, CNC bending, and fabrication systems deliver accuracy, efficiency, and world-class engineering quality.

items.title: Faster Project Delivery
items.desc: Efficient production workflows and expert teams help contractors meet tight deadlines for Vision 2030 projects.

items.title: Sustainable Manufacturing
items.desc: We support eco-friendly construction through recyclable steel solutions and low-waste fabrication practices.

items.title: Empowering the Saudi Workforce
items.desc: We create jobs, train talent, and strengthen local skills in the steel and industrial sectors.

Certificates.trustedDesc: At 24 Seven Steel Production, "Trusted & Verified" means more than just words — it reflects our commitment to precision, quality, and integrity in every project. We combine advanced steel-fabrication and metal-laser cutting technology with rigorous standards of workmanship and client satisfaction.
Certificates.commDesc: Issued by the Ministry of Commerce, Saudi Arabia, this license verifies that the company is officially registered and legally authorized to operate commercial activities.
Certificates.saudiMoC: Ministry of Commerce, Kingdom of Saudi Arabia
Certificates.qrCodeText: Includes QR code for instant authenticity check
Certificates.vatDesc: Issued by the Zakat, Tax and Customs Authority, Saudi Arabia, this certificate confirms that the company is officially registered for Value Added Tax (VAT) compliance.
Certificates.zakatAuthority: Zakat, Tax and Customs Authority, Kingdom of Saudi Arabia

FAQ.subTitle: FAQ — What 24 Seven Steel answers for customers.
FAQ.ctaDesc: Reach out to our expert team for a detailed consultation on your specific steel project needs.

questions.q: Why choose 24 Seven Steel Production Company?
questions.a: They highlight "uncompromising quality" — every steel product is manufactured with precision, tested to meet international standards, ensuring strength, durability, and reliability.

questions.q: What is the process for working with them?
questions.a: The process involves three main steps: 1. Reach out via their contact page (or call / email). 2. Specify your project type, scope, and preferred timeline. 3. Their team consults, plans, and executes the project accordingly.

questions.q: Do they follow market / industry standards in production?
questions.a: Yes, every product is manufactured to meet rigorous international and local industry standards, ensuring top-tier safety and engineering quality for every client.
